content: a tribute to the iconic baddies of *doctor who * stylised enough to be mistaken for a geometric design by the uninitiated stealthy daleks are stationed right around the hat to guard your head from the cold the colourwork design uses a combination of solid-colour rounds with occasional slipped stitches and stranded-colourwork rounds using both techniques avoids the need to deal with long floats for most of the design and makes this a fairly quick and straightforward knit the coordinating insulate mittens 1 pattern is now available also free to download **materials** dk-weight yarn in two colours approximately 70 yards 90 yards for size l of your main/background colour and 50 yards 60 yards for size l of your contrasting colour **sizing** s to fit 16-19 head m to fit 19-22 head l to fit 22-25 head additional sizes can be achieved by adding or subtracting another 16-stitch repeat about 3 <hr> tutorial how i block my hats 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/insulate-mittens 2 https //www baroquepurls com/blog/how-i-block-my-hats
